61:1: sab-ba-ha  lil-laa-hi  maa  fi  sa-maa-waa-ti  wa-maa  fil  ar-di    wa-hu-wal  azee-zul   hakeem
61:2: yaaayyu-hal  lazee-na   aa-ma-noo  li-ma  ta-qoo-loo-na  maa  laa  taf  a-loon
61:3: ka-bu-ra  maq-tan  in-dal  laa-hi   an  ta-qoo-loo  maa  laa  taf  a-loon
61:4: in-nal  laa-ha   yu-hib-bul  lazee-na   yu-qaa-ti-loo-na  fee  sabee-lihee  saf-fan  kaan-na-hum  bu-nyaa-num  mar-soos
61:5: waiz    qaa-la  moo-sa  li-qaw-mihee  yaa-qaw-mi  li-ma  tu-zoo-na-nee  wa-qat  ta-la-moo-na  an-nee  ra-soo-lul  laa-hi   i-lai-kum  fa-lam-maa  zaa-ghooo  a-zaa-ghal  laa-hu   qu-loo-ba-hum  wal-laa-hu  laa  yah-dil  qaw-mal   faa-siqeen
61:6: waiz    qaa-la  ee-sab  nu     ma-rya-ma  yaa-banee  is-raaaee-la  in-nee  ra-soo-lul  laa-hi   i-lai-kum  mu-sad-di-qal  li-maa  bai-na  ya-dayya  mi-nat  taw-raa-ti  wa-mu-bas-hshi-ram  bi-ra-soo-li-ny  yaa-tee  mim  ba-dis  mu-hooo  ah-mad  fa-lam-maa  jaaaa-hum  bil-baiyi-naa-ti  qaa-loo  haa-zaa  sih-rum  mubeen
61:7: wa-man  az-la-mu  mim-ma-nif  ta-raa   a-lal  laa-hil  ka-zi-ba    wa-hu-wa  ya-daaa  i-lal  is-laam     wal-laa-hu  laa  yah-dil  qaw-maz   zaa-limeen
61:8: yu-ree-doo-na  liyut-fioo  noo-ral  laa-hi   bi-a-fwaa-hi-him  wal-laa-hu  mu-tim-mu  noo-rihee  wa-law  ka-ri-hal  kaa-fi-roon
61:9: hu-wal  lazee    ar-sa-la  ra-soo-la-hoo  bi-lhu-daa  wadee-nil  haq-qi   liyu-zhi-ra-hoo  a-lad  dee-ni   kul-lihee  wa-law  ka-ri-hal  mus-hri-koon
61:10: yaaaayyu-hal  lazee-na   aa-ma-noo  hal  a-dul-lu-kum  a-laa  ti-jaa-ra-tin  tun-jee-kum  min  a-zaa-bin  aleem
61:11: tu-mi-noo-na  bil-laa-hi  wa-ra-soo-lihee  wa-tu-jaa-hi-doo-na  fee  sabee-lil  laa-hi   bi-a-mwaa-li-kum  waan-fu-si-kum  zaa-li-kum  khai-rul  la-kum  in  kun-tum  ta-la-moon
61:12: yag-hfir  la-kum  zu-noo-ba-kum  wayud-khil-kum  jan-naa-tin  taj-ree  min  tah-ti-hal  a-nhaa-ru  wa-ma-saa-ki-na  taiyi-ba-tan  fee  jan-naa-ti  adn    zaa-li-kal  faw-zul   azeem
61:13: wauk-hraa  tu-hib-boo-na-haa  nas-rum  mi-nal  laa-hi   wa-fa-thun  qareeb   wa-bas-hshi-ril  mu-mineen
61:14: yaaaayyu-hal  lazee-na   aa-ma-noo  koo-nooo  an-saa-ral  laa-hi   ka-maa  qaa-la  ee-sab  nu     ma-rya-ma  li-lha-waa-riyyee-na  man  an-saareee  i-lal  laah     qaa-lal  ha-waa-riyyoo-na  nah-nu  an-saa-rul  laa-hi   faaa-ma-nat  taaai-fa-tum  mim  banee  is-raaaee-la  wa-ka-fa-rat  taaai-fa-tun  faayyad-nal  lazee-na   aa-ma-noo  a-laa  a-duw-wi-him  faas-ba-hoo  zaa-hireen
